mapper.select: select mi.Member_ID,mi.Logname, mi.Member_Type,mi.Company_ID,mi.Personal_ID,mi.Reg_Date,mi.Member_No, pd.Province_Name,cd.City_Name ,pbi.SexID,ei.EducationName,pbicom.Personal_Name as contactName, pji.Company_Industry as pbiCompany_Industry,pji.Company_Size as pbiCompany_Size, pji.Position,pji.Start_Date,mif.MaritalName,pbi.House_Address,pbi.Personal_IDCard, ci.Company_Industry,ci.Company_Size,ci.Company_Life,ci.Establishments,ci.Company_Address,ci.Companye_BLN, ci.Company_Capital,pji.Monthly_Income, case when mi.Member_Type = 0 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbi.Personal_Name),#{keys})) using utf8) when mi.Member_Type = 1 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ci.Compang_Name),#{keys})) using utf8) end as Personal_Name, case when mi.Member_Type = 0 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbi.Personal_Phone),#{keys})) using utf8) when mi.Member_Type = 1 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbicom.Personal_Phone),#{keys})) using utf8) end as Personal_Phone, PERIOD_DIFF( date_format( now( ),'%Y' ) , date_format( pji.Start_Date, '%Y' ) ) as workYear from Project_App_Record par left join Member_Info mi on par.Member_ID=mi.Member_ID left join Personal_Base_Info pbi on pbi.Personal_ID = mi.Personal_ID and mi.Member_Type =0 left join Personal_Job_Info pji on pji.Personal_ID=pbi.Personal_Id left join Marital_Info mif on pbi.Marital_Status=mif.Marital_ID and mif.Type_Statu =1 left join Education_Info ei on pbi.Education = ei.Education_ID and ei.Type_Statu = 1 left join Province_Dictionary pd on pd.Province_Id = mi.Province_Id left join City_Dictionary cd on cd.City_Id = mi.City_Id left join Company_Info ci on ci.Company_ID = mi.Company_ID and mi.Member_Type =1 left join Personal_Base_Info pbicom on pbicom.Personal_Id = ci.Legal_ID where par.Apply_Id=#{projectID}

select pbi.Personal_Name,pbi.SexID,pbi.Personal_Phone,pbi.Education, pji.Company_Industry as pbiCompany_Industry,pji.Company_Size as pbiCompany_Size,pji.Position,pji.Start_Date,mif.MaritalName,pbi.House_Address from Personal_Job_Info pji left join Personal_Base_Info pbi on pji.Personal_ID=pbi.Personal_Id left join Marital_Info mif on pbi.Marital_Status=mif.Marital_ID where pbi.Personal_Id=#{personalID}

select ci.Compang_Name, ci.Company_Industry,ci.Company_Size,ci.Company_Life ci.Company_Capital,ci.Establishments,pbi.Personal_Name,pbi.Personal_Phone from Company_Info ci left join Personal_Base_Info pbi on pbi.Personal_Id = ci.Personal_Id where ci.Company_ID=#{companyID}
